scenes.action_text: ARBITRAGE Written by Nicholas Jarecki 4/17/11 BLACK. Over CREDITS we HEAR: MARIA (O.S.) ...but you took a huge bet on the housing crisis in the middle of the biggest boom anybody'd ever seen. Why? ROBERT (O.S.) I'm a child of the 50's. My father welded steel for the Navy. And my mother worked at the VA. IN
